column4: can someone tell me the sudo command to get whaetver codecs i need to play a dvd on ubuntu
Well, i'm a bit of a new person still at ubuntu. I just want to watch it, what about gstreamer or something like that, is there codecs i'm missing? I'm also hearing something about libdvdcss2
to watch dvds you need libdvdcss installed - which is illegal to distribute in some companies
